contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | image = | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Arthropod]]a | classis = [[Insect]]a | ordo = [[Lepidoptera]] | familia = [[Noctuidae]] | genus = '''''Xiana''''' | genus_authority = Nye, 1975 }} '''''Xiana''''' was a [[genus]] of [[moth]]s of the [[Noctuidae]] family. It is now considered to be a synonym of ''[[Bastilla (moth)|Bastilla]]''. ==References== *[http://www.nhm.ac.uk/jdsml/research-curation/projects/butmoth/GenusList3.dsml?searchPageURL=index.dsml&SUPERFAMIL=&FAMILYqtype=starts+with&FAMILY=noctuidae&SUBFAMILYqtype=starts+with&SUBFAMILY=&TRIBEqtype=starts+with&TRIBE=&SUBTRIBEqtype=starts+with&SUBTRIBE=&GENUSqtype=starts+with&GENUS=&AUTHORqtype=starts+with&AUTHOR=&YEARqtype=equals&YEAR=&sort=GENUS Natural History Museum Lepidoptera genus database] [[Category:Catocalinae]] {{Catocalinae-stub}}
